main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Fort Worth, Texas on January 23, 1958, described as a bright star-like object moving in and out of clouds at high altitude.
interesting points: The sighting lasted less than 1 minute., The object was suspected to be part of the F-100 series at high altitude., The object made sharp turns and appeared to change speed., It was reported by various witnesses from different locations., The object was noted to be traveling in a northwest to southeast direction.
witness description: An attorney observing the sky with his daughter.
